document_data.name: Sword of Deception
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sword of deception''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s, [[wizard]]s, and [[wu jen]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell summoned a hovering iridescent pale-green sword. The sword flew through the air and struck targets on its own. The sword's skill was the same as that of a warrior of the same spellcasting level of the caster. While the sword could attack multiple creatures during the spell's during, it could only strike a single creature at a time.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required [[material component]]s: a miniature sword and a pair of loaded die.
